title: A Complete Guide to Taurus Sun, Scorpio Moon

steps.title: Taurus-Scorpio people are intense and persistent.
steps.content: Taurus-Scorpio people are intense and persistent. The moon in Scorpio gives them their intensity, while the sun in Taurus gives them their persistence and practicality. They're great both at setting goals and achieving them! The fact that these are both fixed signs means they can seem a bit set in their ways and can be stubborn at times. Elements: earth (Taurus); water (Scorpio) Planets: Venus (Taurus); Pluto (Scorpio) Modalities: both signs are fixed Taurus Sun Traits: practical, persistent, reliable, patient [1] X Research source Scorpio Moon Traits: intense, secretive, sensual, intuitive [2] X Research source Famous Taurus Sun-Scorpio Moon People: Mark Zuckerberg, Wes Anderson, Bono, Tori Spelling, Harper Lee, Tony Hawk

steps.title: Intense
steps.content: Intense The Scorpio moon gives Taurus-Scorpio folks an intensity that means they tend to give at least 110% to everything they do. These aren't the folks to "phone it in" or just do the bare minimum—they're always devoting everything they have to whatever they do. While many people are attracted to this intensity, some people can find it pretty intimidating. Don't worry—they don't necessarily expect everybody to go about things the same way they do! They won't judge you if you're not as focused as they are.

steps.title: Passionate
steps.content: Passionate It's the Scorpio moon, again, that infuses Taurus-Scorpio people with their deep passion. While this might come across as sexual passion, it's just as likely that they show their passion in their zest for life. Their intense emotions also ensure that they're going to feel a burning passion for everything they do. This passion tends to flow just below the surface. On the outside, a Taurus-Scorpio person is typically cool, calm, and collected—although their emotions do sometimes break through.

steps.title: Imaginative
steps.content: Imaginative Taurus-Scorpio people tend to be pretty creative and they're great at thinking outside the box. If you're looking for an innovative solution to a tricky problem, try calling on a Taurus-Scorpio. Chances are, they'll come up with something you never would've thought of before. At the same time, Taurus-Scorpio folks aren't typically the type to have their heads in the clouds. While they do have a strong imagination, they're also very practical and tend to keep themselves pretty grounded.

steps.title: Intuitive
steps.content: Intuitive Scorpio is a water sign, which comes with intuition, and Taurus-Scorpio folks tend to have a sixth sense about people and situations. They're usually very in tune with their surroundings and can spot an ulterior motive or a plot twist a mile away. The dark side of this intuition is that Taurus-Scorpio folks can sometimes be a bit paranoid—or at least seem that way to people around them.

steps.title: Resilient
steps.content: Resilient Taurus-Scorpio folks have a reputation for rolling with the punches. Part of this is owed to their famous stubbornness—once they've got their minds set on something, they're not going to let anything stand in their way! But all the same, they do have a knack for quickly adapting to changes (even if they don't like them) and overcoming any obstacles in their path. A Taurus-Scorpio person also tends to be pretty creative, which means when they do hit a stumbling block, they have no problem coming up with a unique and interesting way to get past it.

steps.title: Secretive
steps.content: Secretive While Taurus-Scorpio folks may have a lot of intense emotions rolling under the surface, on the outside they typically have that pure calm Taurus demeanor. This is because they tend to keep their emotions hidden and can be reluctant to express them openly . In general, they don't really like to let others in. [3] X Research source Astrologer Angel Eyedealism agrees that if someone with their moon in Scorpio "reveals their secrets, then that means they're very serious about you because they have trusted you with their secrets." Because they tend to keep their emotions hidden, Taurus-Scorpio folks can also seem a bit brooding or even moody at times. This is just because no one knows what's really going on inside, so an outburst can seem to come from out of nowhere.

steps.title: Stubborn
steps.content: Stubborn Taurus is a fixed sign, represented in the zodiac by the stubborn bull. Scorpio is also a fixed sign, which means Taurus-Scorpio people have a double dose of that stubbornness. Once they have their eyes set on a goal, you'd be hard-pressed to stray them from their path. Taurus-Scorpio folks also tend to be pretty strong-willed so they might have a hard time backing down, even when they know deep down that they're wrong. Reader Poll: We asked 827 wikiHow readers what the most negative traits in Taureans are, and 56% of them said stubbornness and resistance to change. [Take Poll] So, that's something to be aware of.

steps.title: Committed
steps.content: Committed The determination of Taurus meets the intensity of Scorpio in someone born with the sun in Taurus and the moon in Scorpio. The result is someone who is extremely dedicated to everything they do. The intensity of their attachment extends to people as well, and they tend to be incredibly loyal to anyone close to them. [4] X Research source A Taurus-Scorpio person typically has a hard time letting people in, so they usually aren't close to a lot of other people. But once you're a part of their inner circle, they're never going to let you go. This commitment can come with a dark side. A Taurus-Scorpio typically expects the same level of commitment from others, which can lead to jealousy and possessiveness if they believe they're more committed than the other person is.

steps.title: Taurus-Scorpio folks can shine in the corporate world.
steps.content: Taurus-Scorpio folks can shine in the corporate world. People born with the sun in Taurus tend to crave material security, so they have a natural drive to succeed. This drive, combined with their creativity and resilience, can lead them to great success in business—whether they own their own business or are climbing the corporate ladder. A Taurus-Scorpio person typically has an active imagination, so the entertainment business can be a natural draw for them. They can also make use of their magnetic personality and charming disposition to draw in the crowds. Likewise, Taurus-Scorpio folks tend to be great politicians. Their drive and persistence push them to go the extra mile to win elections and help their constituents.

steps.title: Taurus-Scorpio folks want a partner who is down-to-earth and reliable.
steps.content: Taurus-Scorpio folks want a partner who is down-to-earth and reliable. As an earth sign, Taurus is first and foremost very grounded, so they tend to need a partner who is the same way. When that same partner is also someone they can depend on, they're more likely to trust that person and build a strong bond with them. It tends to take Taurus-Scorpio people a while to truly trust someone . If they see that their partner always does what they say they're going to do, they'll get there that much faster.

steps.title: A Taurus-Scorpio seeks deep understanding and commitment.
steps.content: A Taurus-Scorpio seeks deep understanding and commitment. The Scorpio moon means that the typical Taurus-Scorpio craves an emotionally intense relationship. This can sometimes lead to fireworks, but that's not what the Taurus-Scorpio is after. They'd rather avoid drama, preferring security and stability. A Taurus-Scorpio person is usually not one for a light-hearted fling or one-night stand. They want to commit to someone heart and soul, but it will likely take them some time to get to the point where they feel like they can trust the one they love. The typical Taurus-Scorpio person likes to be in control and wants to be the leader in a relationship—but that doesn't mean they'll make decisions without their partner's input.

steps.title: Taurus-Scorpio folks tend to be intense and sensual in bed.
steps.content: Taurus-Scorpio folks tend to be intense and sensual in bed. Venus, the ruling planet of Taurus, is the astrological source of all that sensuality. Throw in the emotional intensity of Scorpio and you have a recipe for an incredibly erotic experience. Scorpio is a sign with the reputation for being one of the sexiest signs in the zodiac. The moon in Scorpio can make these natives passionate about pleasing their lovers.

steps.title: Taurus-Scorpio folks match best with other water moons.
steps.content: Taurus-Scorpio folks match best with other water moons. Your moon sign tells you how you express your emotions. When your moon signs are in sync, you feel comfortable with someone on a basic, gut level. [5] X Research source For a Taurus-Scorpio, this means they'll tend to feel more comfortable and at ease with folks who also have their moons in a water sign— Cancer , Pisces , and fellow Scorpio moons. [6] X Research source Taurus-Scorpio people also tend to vibe with people who were born with the moon in Virgo or Capricorn . While they don't express emotions quite the same way, they appreciate each other's emotional style and find it easy to work together. A Taurus-Scorpio person will usually clash with someone whose moon is in either Aquarius or Leo . Their ways of expressing emotions are just too different for them to understand each other very well.

steps.title: A Taurus-Scorpio woman tends to be passionate and charming.
steps.content: A Taurus-Scorpio woman tends to be passionate and charming. She knows how to keep the spark alive! And thanks to her strong intuition, she's typically the one who always knows the right thing to say to make those around her feel comfortable and at ease. A Taurus-Scorpio lady knows how to balance her down-to-earth practicality with her emotional intensity. Strengths: committed, practical, intuitive Weaknesses: can have emotional outbursts, may get upset if she isn't the center of attention, can find it hard to trust people In Love: her level of commitment makes her partner feel secure but she can be prone to jealousy

steps.title: The typical Taurus-Scorpio man is as solid as a rock.
steps.content: The typical Taurus-Scorpio man is as solid as a rock. If you're looking for someone you can depend on, look no further than a Taurus-Scorpio man. He's got a cool head on his shoulders and a drive to succeed. When the going gets tough, the Taurus-Scorpio man can figure out how to get through it and come out the other side. Strengths: cool under pressure, charming, strong work ethic Weaknesses: can be stubborn, may struggle with self-destructive tendencies, could be prone to laziness In Love: he is attentive to his partner's needs and intensely loyal, but can also be possessive
